item.title: Yes, We’re In A Constitutional Crisis — And It’s Democrats’ Fault
item.description: The American people need more than just the elected executive to be engaged in this fight. We need Congress to wake up.

item.title: Texan Allegedly Bullied By School Over His Skin Color, Trump Support Asks Supreme Court To Take His Case
item.description: In the spirit of San Jacinto, Warden’s case represents a key battle over a new frontier: racism against white people.

item.title: DeSantis, Florida Legislature Strike Agreement To Expedite Trump’s Deportation Operations
